attributes.additional_details:
We call on HM government to do everything in its power to investigate and or remove the MP for Bradford West Mr George Galloway.
Section 15 of the Terrorism Act 2000  applies to the said member as he is filmed handing over to Hamas  (proscribed) in his own words “ three cars and 25,000 pounds in cash to Prime Minister Ismail Haniyeh. This is politics.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IYFGIbaabTU
He has also mislead the House https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yVI97C64Yks#t=57
The said member has also glorified proscribed Hizballah   "I am here to glorify the Lebanese resistance, Hizballah   . I am here to glorify their leader, Sheikh Hassan Nasrallah."
Nasrallah has stated: "If they (Jews) all gather in Israel, it will save us the trouble of going after them worldwide", Oct. 23, 2002
He has breached the Race Relations Act 1965 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AzIXdQiaRBc &  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P28ttdYSJXs and was questioned by police.
